rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan area integrated with the kitchen, ample natural lighting from large windows and a north-facing entrance. Includes comfortable seating areas.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with contemporary fixtures, integrated into living space for family interactions, efficient workflow area.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Spacious courtyard offering natural light and ventilation throughout the house, aligning with Vastu principles by providing a central focal point.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with private balcony ensuring privacy and fresh air, designed to balance aesthetics with functionality.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (Master)
rooms.description: Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a spacious balcony that overlooks the courtyard for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-designed bedroom complementing the overall duplex layout, featuring an adjoining balcony for natural ventilation and serene views.

openings.description: Primary entry with ample space and a welcoming design, aligns with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Large windows providing abundant natural light and ventilation, designed to enhance the contemporary aesthetic of the villa.
Each bedroom features a private balcony ensuring privacy and fresh air; balconies are designed for relaxation and provide scenic views.
